summary: Allows the processing of raw materials into their processed versions more quickly by adding additional crafting recipes.  Recipes are only visible if the player has the requisite raw materials in their inventory.
descriptionHtml:
Allows the processing of raw materials into their processed versions more quickly by adding additional crafting recipes.  Recipes are only visible if the player has the requisite raw materials in their inventory.

Requirements:
* Skyrim v1.8 or higher

Additional Recipes:
* All ingots (except Dwarven) can now be produced in lots of 5, 10, or 25
* Dwarven ingots can be produced in lots that use 5 units of the requisite raw material
* All leather recipes requiring 1 pelt for 1 unit of leather can now be produced in lots of 5, 10, or 25
* 5 units of leather can be produced from 10 Goat pelts.
* All other leather recipes can can be produced in lots that use 5 of the requisite pelts

Now includes Ars Metallica compatibility version, see readme for details.

Cleaned with TES5Edit  v3.0.24 EXPERIMENTAL
author: MAD

files.name: MAD Ingots and Leather v1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Saved under the new 1.8.151.0 version of the Creation Kit.
Added compatibility version for Ars Metallica - Smithing Enhancement by Arthmoor.

files.name: MAD Ingots and Leather v1_1a
files.changelogHtml: Fixed Steel Ingot recipes to require Steel Smithing Perk in Ars Metallica version.
